body.p:
"THE UNION MUST AND SHALL BE PRESERVED."
United States Sanitary Commission.
July the 1st 1864

Mr John Masters Deer Sir it is withe the gratest of Plesure that I rite you A few lines to lett you know that I am a giting a littel Beter my woond is a giting Beter But my Back and legg is Cripeled so Bad i Cant Walk a Bout very mutch I Shal Put you to the trouble of taking letters out of the Office and Paying for them untill you Rite Some to me you have
got Plenty of time to Rite to me and I know it and for that Reason I will troble you untill you Doo Send me Some leaters to leat me know how you all git a long tell grand mother good morning for me tell Celia ann that She had Beter not take time to Rite to me for I know She has not got time to Rite So no more this But Rite Son Direct like this
Wm Craig to to John Masters
